**What I Got Wrong:**

2. ‚ùå Reported "Guardrail" as if it existed (it's only designed)
3. ‚ùå Didn't clearly separate "planned" from "deployed"
4. ‚ùå Didn't list all 219 tool scripts (just gave count)
5. ‚ùå Didn't check if features were actually implemented vs just planned

**What I Got Right:**

2. ‚úÖ MLS Cursor Watcher is active
3. ‚úÖ Session save system is enhanced
4. ‚úÖ WO Pipeline is broken (correctly identified)
5. ‚úÖ CLC's work was lost (correctly identified)

**The Pattern:**
- I created many **SPECs** and **PLANs**
- But didn't always distinguish between "planned" and "implemented"
- Need to verify actual file existence, not just plan existence
